text: <@U7SL518D6> in the real estate example for custom objects, you guys use file properties right? So do you just copy file locations from the file manager in that for images of the properties etc?

Here is the custom object schema used in that example
<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-custom-objects-example/blob/master/resources/property-listing-schema.json>
Itâ€™s using a text field to link over to an image.
I think there are other ways of doing it though

<@U0177RKAS1H> this is something we are thinking about, but no immediate timeline!

What is your example use case out of curiosity?

So I am creating a custom object for resources, where we will store a dcoument (pdf, pptx, docx) and also some thumbnails of the document  with some information about them and categorising them etc.
Just trying to make sure its as user friendly for the staff to add resources as possible.
